duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee bookings growth and management in Texas, Arkansas, and Missouri.
Manage a team of Field AE’s to discover and develop new opportunities, manage pipeline, and execute account strategies.
Work with regional leaders in Sales Engineering, Sales Development, Channel Development, and Rubrik Partners to exceed sales objectives.
Manage all aspects of the sales process and play an integral role in the success of the overall sales team.
Develop and implement a comprehensive strategy to maximize Rubrik’s position and opportunities across the territory.
Build partner ecosystem and work closely with Focus partners to foster collaboration and opportunity.
Participate in strategic and tactical planning for the region and a key member of the Enterprise Management team.
Develop and execute a Focus plan to maximize revenue and growth across the region.
Drive accurate team forecasting practice in line with management expectations.
Conduct weekly progress meetings with sales team.
Assist in the development of short, medium, and long-term plans to achieve strategic objectives.
Regularly interact across functional areas with senior management or executives to ensure region objectives are met.
Ability to influence thinking or gain acceptance of others in sensitive situations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
